mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Shubham,

I hope this message finds you well.

We have successfully updated the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC, associated with LEI ID K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32. The updated checklist now includes the latest data as well as addresses the previously identified missing information.

### Final Updated Checklist Summary:

| Checklist Item                         | Status     | Comment                                                                                     | Source                           |
|----------------------------------------|------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                  | Validated  | Address proof is available with utility bill issued by London City Utilities.              | DIM_CompanyAddressProof          |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated  | Annual accounts and Ellipro scores for 2020–2022 are available and verified.               | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details        | Validated  | Bank and postal details are verified with available bank account and SWIFT code.           | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails  |
| Company Directorship                   | Pending    | Directorship details are available but verification is incomplete.                         | DIM_CompanyDirectorship          |
| Company Tax Documentation              | Pending    | Tax documentation is available but requires additional information and verification.       | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments          |
| Company Regulatory Compliance          | Pending    | Regulatory compliance is partially compliant; some reviews are pending.                   | DIM_CompanyRegulatory            |
| Company Business Scope                 | Validated  | Verified business scope details are available, highlighting leadership roles and services. | DIM_CompanyBusinessScope         |
| Company PEP Screening                  | Validated  | PEP screening data is available, detailing politically exposed individuals and their risk ratings. | PEP Screening Data              |
| Company Revenue Details                | Validated  | Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars for the year ended December 31, 2023 is reported.| Annual Report                   |
| Company Market Capitalization Details  | Validated  | Market capitalization as of December 31, 2023 is reported as 489,320 million dollars.      | Annual Report                   |

The final checklist has been securely saved in a JSON file named `final_updated_checklist.json`. Please let me know if you need any further assistance or additional information.

Best regards,
Surbhi
